message: Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more, but that's my final offer. We need to reach an agreement before the money shrinks further!
Come on, it's only fair I get a bit more. Time is running out!
We're both losing money with each round. Let's go back to my original offer, 50/50. It's the best chance we have to get anything at all.
